skillTree.localised_description: The Beastman's tusks are drenched in gore - blood and sinew from every foul battle.
Fur-clad, matted with offal and detritus, their weathered hides are a foul carapace.
He knows. Nobody knows how, but he does. He has always just known.
Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The weird, evil moon hangs low in the sky, drawing reverence from its abominable worshippers.
The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
Take it all!
We leave only burning houses behind.
There's no keeping this one from the battlefield for long.
You think a dagger in my back is going to kill me? Ha! It’s just going to make me mad.
Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
We leave only burning houses behind.
This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: The warherd waits, allowing the enemy to come to them. Nature is their defence, as man will soon find out.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Strength of the Land III"

skillTree.localised_description: The warherd charges out, slathering jaws and bellowing in fury. Against the charge, none can stand.
A strong leader can bend the will of the warherd to his own, and reap the benefits of it.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: The warherd, though vast and hard to control, can be relied on to fight, fight, fight!

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Terror for Minotaurs units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit (200)

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.

attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one has something of the compost heap about them…
Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Blessed by the Dark Gods to never feel pain.
His scent is strong even amongst the herd.
Ungors obey!

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

Melee and missile weapon damage: +10% for Ungor units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Herds crumble but he stands.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Wild as a warhound, he never sleeps.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 for Chaos Warhounds and Harpies units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always watching and stalking his pray!

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(all units in army)
